img_summary: The image depicts a consumable item from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" called Tonifying Decoction. This rare item, when used, significantly increases the player's maximum stamina for an extended period. The formula for this decoction can be purchased from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge and is also available at the Shrine Store in The New West. Crafting the decoction requires 1 Celestial Peat and 1 Licorice.
